name: Cubeba
Relationship: Compare: CUCURBITA; COPAIVA; PIPER METH.; SANDAL.

Respiratory: Catarrh of nose and throat, with fetid odor and expectoration
Urine: Urethritis, with much mucus, especially IN WOMEN

details: Mucous membranes generally, but especially that of the urinary tract, are chiefly affected by this remedy. Frequent urination of a nervous origin. Leucorrhoea in little girls.
